alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:53PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Hamilton and northwestern Warren Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 253 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lake Durant Campground to near North Creek. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Indian Lake, Blue Mountain Lake, North Creek, Lake Durant Campground, Byrnes Corners, Eagle Nest, North River, Igerna, Sabael, Christian Hill, Holcombville and Catlin Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for eastern and east central New York.
